content:
I've been using the S Pen with the Samsung Notes app, which I find really useful for taking notes during meetings and organizing my thoughts. I've also been using it with the Adobe Illustrator Draw app to create some simple designs and sketches. The S Pen's precision and accuracy make it perfect for these tasks.

Speaking of precision, I've also been using the S Pen to edit photos on my phone. The S Pen's fine tip allows me to make precise selections and edits, which is really helpful when I need to touch up a photo quickly.

I haven't tried using the S Pen with AR Doodle or Live Messages yet, but I'll definitely give it a shot. The idea of creating 3D doodles that come to life in augmented reality sounds like a lot of fun!

What about you? Have you used the S Pen with any specific apps or services that you find particularly useful?
